<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass implements a demanded bits analysis. A demanded bit is one that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// contributes to a result; bits that are not demanded can be either zero or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// one without affecting control or data flow. For example in this sequence:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %1 = add i32 %x, %y</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %2 = trunc i32 %1 to i16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only the lowest 16 bits of %1 are demanded; the rest are removed by the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// trunc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491" lineLink="#ab0b0d4186175ae749e0fa20fca628699"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> <a href="#ab0b0d4186175ae749e0fa20fca628699">determineLiveOperandBitsAddCarry</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OperandNo,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;AOut,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits">KnownBits</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits">KnownBits</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CarryZero, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CarryOne) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!(CarryZero &amp;&amp; CarryOne) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Carry can&#39;t be zero and one at the same time&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The following check should be done by the caller, as it also indicates</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that LHS and RHS don&#39;t need to be computed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if (AOut.isMask())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   return AOut;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Boundary bits&#39; carry out is unaffected by their carry in.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> Bound = (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>.Zero &amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>.Zero) | (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>.One &amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>.One);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First, the alive carry bits are determined from the alive output bits:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Let demand ripple to the right but only up to any set bit in Bound.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   AOut         = -1----</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Bound        = ----1-</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ACarry&amp;~AOut = --111-</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> RBound = Bound.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a7b8b4253b618610eb5cb497b4104ebc3">reverseBits</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> RAOut = AOut.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a7b8b4253b618610eb5cb497b4104ebc3">reverseBits</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> RProp = RAOut + (RAOut | ~RBound);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> RACarry = RProp ^ ~RBound;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> ACarry = RACarry.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a7b8b4253b618610eb5cb497b4104ebc3">reverseBits</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Then, the alive input bits are determined from the alive carry bits:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> NeededToMaintainCarryZero;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> NeededToMaintainCarryOne;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OperandNo == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NeededToMaintainCarryZero = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>.Zero | <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">~RHS</a>.Zero;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NeededToMaintainCarryOne = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>.One | <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">~RHS</a>.One;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NeededToMaintainCarryZero = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>.Zero | <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">~LHS</a>.Zero;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NeededToMaintainCarryOne = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>.One | <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">~LHS</a>.One;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// As in computeForAddCarry</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> PossibleSumZero = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">~LHS</a>.Zero + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">~RHS</a>.Zero + !CarryZero;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> PossibleSumOne = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>.One + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>.One + CarryOne;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The below is simplified from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// APInt CarryKnownZero = ~(PossibleSumZero ^ LHS.Zero ^ RHS.Zero);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// APInt CarryKnownOne = PossibleSumOne ^ LHS.One ^ RHS.One;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// APInt CarryUnknown = ~(CarryKnownZero | CarryKnownOne);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// APInt NeededToMaintainCarry =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (CarryKnownZero &amp; NeededToMaintainCarryZero) |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (CarryKnownOne  &amp; NeededToMaintainCarryOne) |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   CarryUnknown;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> NeededToMaintainCarry = (~PossibleSumZero | NeededToMaintainCarryZero) &amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                (PossibleSumOne | NeededToMaintainCarryOne);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> AB = AOut | (ACarry &amp; NeededToMaintainCarry);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/demandedbits/#a4fe7a48a211004f16170900dba49e625"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/demandedbits/#a4fe7a48a211004f16170900dba49e625">DemandedBits::determineLiveOperandBitsAdd</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OperandNo,</span></CodeLine>
